action.action-desc: Mr. Vasquez (for himself and Mr. Valadao) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an annual increase in stipend for books, supplies, equipment, and other educational costs under Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veteran Education Assistance Adjustment Act.

section.header: Annual increase in stipend for books, supplies, equipment, and other educational costs under Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of Department of Veterans Affairs
section.text: Section 3313 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (c)(1)(B)(iv)(I), by striking $1,000 and inserting $1,400;
in subsection (e)(2)(B)(i), by striking $1,000 and inserting $1,400; and
by adding at the end the following new subsection:

subsection.header: Annual increase in stipend for books, supplies, equipment, and other educational costs
subsection.text: With respect to fiscal year 2026 and each subsequent fiscal year, the Secretary shall provide a percentage increase (rounded to the nearest dollar) in the amounts payable under subsections (c)(1)(B)(iv)(I), (e)(2)(B)(i), and (g)(3)(A)(iii), equal to the percentage by which—

paragraph.text: the Consumer Price Index for all urban consumers (U.S. city average) for the 12-month period ending on the June 30 preceding the beginning of the fiscal year for which the increase is made, exceeds
the Consumer Price Index for the 12-month period preceding the 12-month period described in paragraph (1).
